name: Tap and Slash
description:
Amazing wave clearing hack and slash game.
Very easy, addictive and fun to play.
Infinity stages.
Gather experience to level up your tap power.

How to play:
- Kill all monsters until you fill the green bar.
- Pick up hearts and avoid the mines to gain more time
- Collect gold coins to increase your tap damage
- Level up to increase your tap power and defeat the boss each 10 stages to claim it reward.

All achievements and leaderboard connected to Apple Game Center.

Have fun!
